title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CloudStorageOptions
name: CloudStorageOptions
description:
Options defining a file or a set of files (path ending with *) within a Google Cloud Storage bucket.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CloudStorageOptions

Extends \Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

methods.name: getBytesLimitPerFile
methods.description:
Max number of bytes to scan from a file. If a scanned file's size is bigger than this value then the rest of the bytes are omitted.

Generated from protobuf field int64 bytes_limit_per_file = 4;

methods.name: setBytesLimitPerFile
methods.description:
Max number of bytes to scan from a file. If a scanned file's size is bigger than this value then the rest of the bytes are omitted.

Generated from protobuf field int64 bytes_limit_per_file = 4;

params.name: var
params.description: Max number of bytes to scan from a file. If a scanned file's size is bigger than this value then the rest of the bytes are omitted.

methods.name: getFileTypes
methods.description:
List of file type groups to include in the scan.

If empty, all files are scanned and available data format processors are applied.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.privacy.dlp.v2.FileType file_types = 5;

methods.name: setFileTypes
methods.description:
List of file type groups to include in the scan.

If empty, all files are scanned and available data format processors are applied.

Generated from protobuf field repeated .google.privacy.dlp.v2.FileType file_types = 5;

params.name: var
params.description:
List of file type groups to include in the scan.

If empty, all files are scanned and available data format processors are applied.

methods.name: getFilesLimitPercent
methods.description:
Limits the number of files to scan to this percentage of the input FileSet.

Number of files scanned is rounded down. Must be between 0 and 100, inclusively. Both 0 and 100 means no limit. Defaults to 0.

Generated from protobuf field int32 files_limit_percent = 7;

methods.name: setFilesLimitPercent
methods.description:
Limits the number of files to scan to this percentage of the input FileSet.

Number of files scanned is rounded down. Must be between 0 and 100, inclusively. Both 0 and 100 means no limit. Defaults to 0.

Generated from protobuf field int32 files_limit_percent = 7;

params.name: var
params.description:
Limits the number of files to scan to this percentage of the input FileSet.

Number of files scanned is rounded down. Must be between 0 and 100, inclusively. Both 0 and 100 means no limit. Defaults to 0.
